attributes.action: reject any notion of charging vehicles according to number plate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is insane to even think about levying charges on any vehicles without UK numberplates. Not only will this kill the tourist trade. What do you think will happen to prices in the shops?
The fuel prices (80% tax) are already way above most other European countries.
Also, given that you can tell from a UK plate where the vehicle is registered, how long will it be before the counties start thinking about charging for "out of county" vehicles?
